PERSERVERANCE AND PROPER GRAFT

Elbow Grease is dedicate to hard work and independent thinking.goal is to document the lengths people go to for their work, struggles and their joys.

Work has an innate value the goes beyond the quest for cash,we believe stories of people who are brave enough to do somthing they love,make a real difference,maybe just to make ends meet, are worth sharing.

1

issue #1
Ascendance

our first issue, we look at what work means, or had meant, to people at differentstages in there own journeys.
